using Lime;

namespace <%NAMESPACE%>
{
	public class <%CLASS_NAME%> : <%CLASS_NAME%><Frame>
	{
		public const string AssetPath = <%SCENE_PATH%>;

		public static readonly Frame FrameCache = (Frame)Node.CreateFromAssetBundle(AssetPath);

		public <%CLASS_NAME%>() : base(FrameCache.Clone<Node>()) { }

		public <%CLASS_NAME%>(Node node) : base(node) { }

		public new <%CLASS_NAME%> Clone()
		{
			return new <%CLASS_NAME%>(It.Clone<Node>());
		}
	}

	public class <%CLASS_NAME%><T> : ParsedNode where T : Node
	{
		public T It => (T)Node;
		<%COMMON_BASE%>

		<%INNER_CLASSES%>
		<%FIELDS%>

		public <%CLASS_NAME%>() : this(<%CLASS_NAME%>.FrameCache.Clone<Node>()) { }

		public <%CLASS_NAME%>(Node node)
		{
			Node = node;
			<%INIT_FIELDS%>
		}

		public <%CLASS_NAME%><T> Clone()
		{
			return new <%CLASS_NAME%><T>(It.Clone<Node>());
		}

		<%ANIMATIONS%>
	}
}
